sentences.sContent: Methods: The location of bony "window" and mastoid foramen were studied , and the distance from bony "window" to cerebellopontine angle was measured on 18 dry and 12 wet cranial bones.
sentences.sContent_eng: Methods: The location of bony "window" and mastoid foramen were studied , and the distance from bony "window" to cerebellopontine angle was measured on 18 dry and 12 wet cranial bones.
sentences.sCn: 方法：采用干性颅骨18具，福尔马林固定的头颅标本12具分别进行骨窗及乳突孔的定位测量和桥小脑角结构距骨窗的距离测定。

words.tran: 有头盖的；有头动物的；脊椎动物的
颅骨学者；头盖骨研究者
